RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 1 300 Y Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Purse 6300. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MS EIRELI drifted in, all out. J BEST QUEEN dueled, drifted out, out kicked. DADDYS VELVET CARTEL hard fought loss. FELL OFF THE WAGON dueled, steadied late. J PERRYS BEST no threat. SA SHEZA FAST MOON outrun. A STEWARDS INQUIRY WAS POSTED INTO THE RUNNING NEARING THE FINISH LINE ALSO A TRAINER OBJECTION WAS POSTED THE TRAINER OF FELL OFF THE WAGON CLAIMED FOUL AGAINST MS EIRELI FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE NEARING THE WIRE AFTER A STEWARDS REVIEW THE CLAIM OF FOUL WAS DISALLOWED AND NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

ENTRY.NAME: Sa Sheza Fast Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Daddys Velvet Cartel
ENTRY.OWNER: Echerivel Augusto V and Cardenas Jose E
ENTRY.COMMENT: hard fought loss

ENTRY.NAME: J Perrys Best
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat

ENTRY.NAME: J Best Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, drifted out, out kicked

ENTRY.NAME: Fell Off the Wagon
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, steadied late

ENTRY.NAME: Ms Eireli
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted in, all out

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 2 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 84. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 6800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5000 OR LESS IN 2022-2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $6250 OR COLORADO BRED CLAIMING PRICE $8000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250. Colorado Bred Claiming Pr ice $8,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AWESOME BID went to the front to set a pressured pace, was headed at the five sixteenths pole, dug in to draw clear and just lasted. A GEM IS A GEM tracked the leaders to the middle of the turn then angled out to two or three wide at the quarter pole and moved between horses at the three sixteenths pole, bumped with outside rival but kept on for a late run but was not enough. LAUNCHED vied for the lead from three wide to the middle of the turn then engaged the leader nearing the five sixteenths pole and match strides to the three sixteenths pole and tired. JUSTIN SPEIGHT prompted the pace to mid turn and gave way. SEEULATERGATOR was off the pace in the two path to the quarter pole, moved out to four wide in upper stretch and was bumped by inside rival but lacked a late kick. CREATIVE LETTERS had no early speed, made a mild bid in the stretch but was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Bid
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressured pace, headed 5/16, dug in, just lasted,

ENTRY.NAME: Justin Speight
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt pace, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: A Gem Is a Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, 2-3w 1/4, btwn 3/16, bumped, late run, not enuf

ENTRY.NAME: Creative Letters
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, mild bid stretch, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Seeulatergator
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 2p, 4wupper, bumped, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Launched
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead 3w, engaged leader 5/16, match strides, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 56. Maiden Special Weight Purse 10700. FOR COLORADO BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOLY MISSION prompted the pace from the two path then engaged the leader at the half mile marker and edged way going into the turn, drew off into the stretch and won going away. SILENCE'S NATION sprinted away to a narrow lead then was headed at the half mile marker and chased the winner home. RUNNIN BUFFALO tracked the leaders down the backstretch then moved out to three wide on the turn and passed tiring rivals in the stretch. MAJOR TIMING vied for the lead from the inside to the five furlong marker then fell back and saved ground around the turn, passed tiring foe in early stretch and weakened. WALKIN TALKIN BOB stumbled at the start to be last away, then rushed up to be in contention from three wide to the three furlong marker and slowly faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Major Timing
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, saved ground turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Runnin Buffalo
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, 3wturn, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Walkin Talkin Bob
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, rushed to contention, slow fade

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Mission
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt pace, engaged 1/2, edged away, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Silence's Nation
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted away, headed 1/2, chased winner

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 6400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES IN 2023(RACES WHERE ENTERED FOR $2500 OR LESS NOT CONSIDERED). Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MILLI STARR was hustled to the lead, edged away around the turn and just lasted. DOZO vied for the lead from three wide, made a late gain to be second best. NEW YEARS LOVE prompted the pace in the early stages then moved between horses at the eighth pole to fight gamely in the stretch and missed the place. AUNT IRENE was off the pace down the backstretch then fell back on the turn, moved out to four wide but floated out to mid track in upper stretch and improved position. SWEET TATUM was off the pace on the inside then made a mild bid in the stretch but faltered. RAGING LADY was close up while racing wide through the turn and was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Tatum
ENTRY.OWNER: Rushton Stacey Eskew Stuart and Alfrey Vance
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace inside, mild bid stretch, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Milli Starr
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled to lead, edged away, just lasted,

ENTRY.NAME: Aunt Irene
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, fell back turn, floated out upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Raging Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, wide thru turn, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: New Years Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt pace, between 1/8, gamely, missed 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Dozo
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, late gain, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 75. Allowance Purse 12500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COCKTAIL SLIPPERS was rushed up to the lead then was headed at the quarter pole and dueled down the stretch, cleared late and held on. TRULY A MESS stalked the pace through the turn then made a late rail bid and just missed. DREAMER GIRL pressed the pace to mid turn then moved to engage the leader at the quarter pole, dueled down the stretch and gave way grudgingly. WHISTLING HOME was last to the turn then moved up from five wide around the turn, made a mild gain in the stretch but was not enough. PRINCESS JAYLEEN tracked the leaders from the two path, made a three wide bid at the three furlong marker but lacked the late response.

ENTRY.NAME: Truly a Mess
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, late rail bid, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Princess Jayleen
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, 3wturn, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Whistling Home
ENTRY.COMMENT: last, 5wturn, mild gain stretch, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Cocktail Slippers
ENTRY.COMMENT: rush to lead, headed 1/4, stretch duel, held on

ENTRY.NAME: Dreamer Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, engaged leader 1/4, stretch duel, grudgingly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 6200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $3,500. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PODEROSO EQUS roused to a pressured lead to mid turn then edged away to be an easy winner. RANCHER hopped leaving the gate then moved up the rail through the turn, angled out to three wide at the eighth pole to be a clear second. TOMBI tracked the leaders to mid turn then moved out to three or four wide in upper stretch to be along for the show. GOLD NOTE saved ground through the turn then moved out to mid track to make a late rally. MASTERPIECE DAY pressed the pace from the two path to the top of the stretch and gave way. KICK IT stalked the pace from three wide to the quarter pole and weakened. ARIMONY was always back.

ENTRY.NAME: Rancher
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, move up rail, 3w1/8, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Arimony
ENTRY.COMMENT: always back

ENTRY.NAME: Gold Note
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, mid track rally

ENTRY.NAME: Tombi
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, 3-4w upper, along for show

ENTRY.NAME: Kick It
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3w, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Poderoso Equs
ENTRY.COMMENT: roused to lead, edged away, easy winner

ENTRY.NAME: Masterpiece Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, gave way,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 6800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME OR COLORADO BREDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; , 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GIMME SPACE stalked the pace to mid turn then slipped through at the five sixteenths pole and drew off. KEENEYE GEORGE co-led from the two path to the five sixteenths pole then was eclipsed at the quarter pole but made a rebid to be second best. PRINCE OTTO was forwardly placed in the three path to mid turn then angled in at the five sixteenths pole but was no match for the winner. OH SNAP trailed the field through the turn then made a late rally and just missed the show. MY PAL raced in the middle of the pack to the top of stretch then tucked in to the rail at the three sixteenths pole but faltered. PARABELLUM co-led from the inside to mid turn and tired. CLAIMJUMPER was last away then moved up from six wide down the backstretch, kept on four or five wide on the turn but failed to sustain the bid. NORTHRNDANCRSGHOST was off the pace in the two path to the seven sixteenths pole and retreated.

ENTRY.NAME: Gimme Space
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, slipped through 5/16, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Parabellum
ENTRY.COMMENT: co-led inside, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Keeneye George
ENTRY.COMMENT: co-led, eclipsed 1/4, rebid, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Northrndancrsghost
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Oh Snap
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, late rally, missed show

ENTRY.NAME: Prince Otto
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, angled in 5/16, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Claimjumper
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, 4-6w trip, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: My Pal
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, rail bid 3/16, faltered

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 47. Maiden Claiming Purse 6000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOBILEAGILEHOSTILE raced in the middle of the pack while saving ground down the backstretch then moved out to three wide on the turn to engage the leader in early stretch and drove past to clear late. COWGIRLLOVER rushed to a clear lead to the quarter pole then was collared nearing the eighth pole but stayed on to prove second best. SPARKLE IN THE SKY stalked the pace from three wide around the turn then engaged the leader at the eighth pole but was empty and chased the top two home. WHEREDIDITGO raced in the middle of the pack down the backstretch then moved between horses at the three furlong marker and tucked back inside at the quarter pole to be best of rest. KINSLEYS SWEET PEA had no early speed through the turn then moved out to four wide in early stretch to make a rally and improved position. BIG CREEK FIRE stalked the pace from four wide down the backstretch then moved in to two wide on the turn but failed to menace. PIZZA GIRL was forwardly placed down the backstretch then fell back on the turn and was not a factor. ATHENIAN PRINCESS saved ground to no avail. ITHOUGHTIKNEW tracked the leaders on the backstretch then dropped back. DANGERELLA was never a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Cowgirllover
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear lead, collared 1/8, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Athenian Princess
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Pizza Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, fell back turn, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Mobileagilehostile
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, saved ground, 3wturn, engaged 1/8, cleared late

ENTRY.NAME: Ithoughtiknew
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, dropped back,

ENTRY.NAME: Wherediditgo
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, between 3/8, tucked in 1/4, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Dangerella
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Kinsleys Sweet Pea
ENTRY.COMMENT: no early speed, 4wupper, rallied, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Sparkle in the Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, engaged leader1/8, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Big Creek Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 2wturn, failed to menace,
